assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study was ethically approved at the Sheba Medical Center (SMC), Beilinson, Shamir, and Kaplan Medical centers by the Institutional Review Board (IRB), and each participant gave an informed consent. At the Shaare Zedek Medical Center (SZMC) the study was exempt from the need to obtain participant consent.
